name: Space Engineers
notes: You have to install libjpeg62 package or else the thumbnails in New Game menu will be dispalyed as magenta rectangles. Due to JIT compiler issues and the way this game uses multithreating, there are audio stutters. If you are on a Debian-based distribution you can try the libFAudio package from this PPA: https://launchpad.net/~cybermax-dexter/+archive/ubuntu/sdl2-backport

task.description: Installing .NET 4.8. This will take a while...
task.name: winetricks

content:
game:
  appid: 244850
  arch: win64
  prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
installer:
- write_file:
    content: dxgi.nvapiHack = False
    file: $GAMEDIR/prefix/dxvk.conf
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: vcrun2017 xact
    arch: win64
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: dotnet48 win7
    arch: win64
    description: Installing .NET 4.8. This will take a while...
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
system:
  env:
    DXVK_CONFIG_FILE: $GAMEDIR/prefix/dxvk.conf
    DXVK_HUD: compiler
    STAGING_SHARED_MEMORY: 0
  pulse_latency: true
winesteam:
  dxvk: true
  esync: true
  overrides:
    msvcr120: n,b
    nvapi,nvapi64: disabled
